Hotmail isn't letting Jen sign in, so she asked me to finish the
nanobots' actions on the CF. This is the only time I'll be posting for
them.

::Cledar/Nanobots::

Seeing Motormaster join with the Stunticons to become a gestalt,
Cledar aims his fusion cannon and fires a large shot at the gestalt's
chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The nanobots feel (however nanobots feel) that a bot had landed on the
CF, and quickly finish what they were doing. With a large clatter, the
once-proud ship, or at least its outer hull, buckles and collapses,
raising alot of dust and leaving a pile of metal. Once the plates
settle to the ground, the nanobots begin to eat them apart and
transport them to the Element.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron looks up at Menasor, and sighs. "That's right Menasor,
crush
> the Gestalt" he screamed. He then used the amplification of
Astroblast
> again. "Cyclonus, Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Scourge. Abandon your
> mission, and meet me down here" he yelled.
> 
> Sinnertwin was getting bored, and noticed Menasor merge (kinda hard
not
> to) he jumped up, transformed, and flew towards Megatron.
> 
> Megatron floated out of Astroblast, and landed on the CF, and walked
> towards the nearest Autogun. He then grabbed it, and used his
strength
> to rip it out. (YAn, I dont know if you post for it if it rips out
or
> not).
